::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::

    Wolveritron went to kick at the fallen b=
ot, but Eclipse stopped him. "He's badely injured, he's going to need a CR =
chamber."
    Ramus commed the CF (If it's still functional and not in lock=
 down.) "We need a CR chamber, any near the area?"
  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, F=
ebruary 23, 2001 6:28 AM
  Subject: Re: is that the best you got?


  somet=
imes I get tired of it too. Since Wolveritron was hit by Razor claws foot I=
 take it he was cut.

  Razor Claw fealt the feal of mech fluid on the claw=
s on his feet. He was pleased with himself. He ducked his head forward maki=
ng the blow to his neck miss. He curled backward feeling the slash in the b=
ack.

  A sudden gut fealing told him he was badly hurt as a set of claws r=
ipped into him. The raptor screamed in pain collapsing to the ground convul=
sing and spitting mech fluid. His body jerked back and forth.

  Razor Claw=
 transformed to bot mode, the virus causing it to appear to mealt back to p=
rotoform. "What have you done to me!!!!!" He yelled, his rage welling up in=
side of him. He fealt no pain as he collapsed in shock not knowing why such=
 little damage would cause such a reaction.
    ----- Original Message ----=
- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, =
February 22, 2001 7:32 AM
    Subject: Re: is that the best you got?


    =
Actully, I'm getting tired of this RPG

    ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

=
        Wolveritron got hit by the foot. He swung his claws on his left han=
d out at the raptor, aiming for the next. His right hand claws swung for th=
e guys gut.
        Eclipse went around to the back out the bot, and starte=
d to claw at his back. Ramus used his arm blades and started to claw at his=
 right side.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 11:=
03 AM
      Subject: is that the best you got?


      12 blasts from three=
 sides huh. bad move for the ones on the left and right. OK hows this?

   =
   Razor Claw forced his way forward getting pummeled by the majority of th=
e shots. He lept upward causing some of the shots from the side to head tow=
ard the opposite bot. The bleeding raptor worked his way close enough to Wo=
lveritron where future shots could hit either one. he slashed at the bot wi=
th his clawed feat. "Fight for yourself coward your friends will have more =
than enough opportunities to die later, nows your turn. Do you here the Mat=
rix calling you home?" The beast had lost it's mind or it would have though=
t to hold still and use his forcefield instead of getting beat upon in a th=
ree on one fight.

      (Come on Dachande you afraid of a little scratch?)=


        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: dachande 
        To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 9:16 AM=

        Subject: Re: Dachande did you forget?


        I must have.

    =
    ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

            They all fired their weapons=
 at the raptor, and the were to the front of him, the left and the right. E=
ach 4 times.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERW=
OLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, Febr=
uary 21, 2001 11:54 AM
          Subject: Fw: Dachande did you forget?


  =
        heres the last post I have for the fight between Razor Claw and Wol=
veritron.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF=
4 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, February 1=
2, 2001 7:31 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


         =
 Razor Claw glared at the three opponents with hate in his eyes and drool d=
ripping from his jaw. The raptor no longer had control of his actions and w=
ouldn't be stopped until justice had been served. "You fear me." He states =
through a half closed mouth. 

          He looked back at his origional pr=
ey, "You fear me so much that you will not fight one on one." He took a few=
 steps forward lowering his head to the level of Wolveritron so they could =
look eye to eye. The anger and hatred split the air as the two looked towar=
d each other. The teeth of one and the claws of the acused reflected in the=
 light around. Two bots enter, one bot leaves and if Razor Claw had his way=
 the Wolverine in bot mode would be the apetizer.


            ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
            From: dachande 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 6:30 AM
           =
 Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


            ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/=
Ramus::

                "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Because=
 you ticked me off."
                Eclipse transformed to his full out ba=
ttle mode, standing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full len=
gth, 5 inches. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid =
on them.
                Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor=
 Claw.
                "We're ready for ya," They said. They would not make=
 the first move, though.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
       =
       Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
              Subject: Re: D=
achande respond or else


              Razor Claw rolled out the busted wi=
ndshield using the tuck and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

   =
           "You decide to fight after all I see." the raptor yells in his r=
age. he charges forward biting at Wolveritron. "You fight me now, after lea=
ving your team to fight alone? I will kill you slowly."


                -=
---- Original Message ----- 
                From: dachande 
              =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, February 10, =
2001 7:47 AM
                Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


      =
          He is.

                ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::

          =
          His claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fig=
ht for me, Bub?"
                    "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," =
Eclipse said, putting his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give i=
t to him."
                    "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron=
 said.
                    Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a twi=
n of Ramulus). "I have no problem giving him what he wants."
              =
      He didn't fire though.
